sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-update', templateUrl: './update.component.html', styleUrls: ['./update.component.css'] }) export class UpdateComponent { }

Update Product

Product name is required.
Enter a valid price greater than zero.
Discount price must be lower than the original price.
Please Enter a category.
Description must be at least 10 characters.
product Quantity must be at least 1.
